title: Bantu tribes of Southern Africa
creator_contributor_role: Paul Hoefler Special Productions, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Bantus - South Africa
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Industries - South Africa
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Industries - South Africa
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/South Africa - Social conditions
description: Describes the old ways of life among the Zulu, Xhosa, Swazi, Ndebele, Sotho and Venda tribes. These various Bantu groups are now being brought into the South African industrial community. Outlines the ways in which this movement is changing the culture of the tribes and the struggle to preserve some of the old ways.
